CustomField.description: Total Estimated Price (Estimated quantity multiplied by estimated unit price)
CustomField.formula: IF(SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c > 0, SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c * SVMXC__Estimated_Price2__c - (SVMXC__Discount__c*(SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c * SVMXC__Estimated_Price2__c)), SVMXC__Estimated_Quantity2__c * SVMXC__Estimated_Price2__c - (SVMXC__Discount__c*(SVMXC__Estimated_Quantity2__c * SVMXC__Estimated_Price2__c)))
CustomField.label: Total Estimated Price
